text1
text2

The first line "だけど病気でどんどん目が悪くなっていってね" translates to "But my eyes are getting worse little by little due to my illness."
The second line "絵描きなりにショックだったんだろう" translates to "Drawing pictures just came as a shock to me."
The third line "仕事が減って金もなくなって焼きが回ったのか" translates to "Since work has been decreasing and I don't have any money left, my debts have been accumulating."
The fourth line "私をモデルにしようとする始末さ" translates to "I'm trying to use myself as a model."
The fifth line "挙句の果てに博打で借金こさえて川にドボン" translates to "I borrowed money up to my eyeballs and threw it into the river."
The sixth line "ひどい父親だろ?" translates to "What about my terrible father?"
The last line "...結局" translates to "in the end."
The eleventh line "レーネさんはモデルに?" translates to "Were you using Reine as a model?"
The twelfth line "...ああ" translates to "Anyway."
The thirteenth line "しつこいもんだったからさ" translates to "I couldn't afford it."
The last but one line "私なんか描いても大した
